channel.title: Defender models wrong colors

item.title: Defender models wrong colors
item.dc:creator: @iHybridu iHybridu
item.description:
@iHybridu wrote:

Using client released here
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/downloads/340979-oldschool-start.html

Tried using these defender models
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/models/323160-various-popular-models-317-perfect-ints.html
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/models/142303-my-renamed-models.html

Rune defender int

		case 3101:
            itemDef.actions = new String[5];
            itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield";
            itemDef.modifiedModelColors = new int[2];
            itemDef.originalModelColors = new int[2];
            itemDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 28;
            itemDef.modifiedModelColors[1] = 74;
            itemDef.originalModelColors[0] = 38676;
            itemDef.originalModelColors[1] = 38313;
            itemDef.modelID = 15335; //Model ID
            itemDef.modelZoom = 490;
            itemDef.modelRotation1 = 344;
            itemDef.modelRotation2 = 192;
            itemDef.anInt204 = 0;
            itemDef.modelOffset1 = 1;
            itemDef.modelOffset2 = 20;
            itemDef.maleEquip1 = 15413; //Male equip
            itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 15413; //Female equip
            itemDef.anInt175 = 56;
            itemDef.anInt197 = 116;
            itemDef.anInt164 = -1;
            itemDef.anInt188 = -1;
            itemDef.stackable = false;
            itemDef.name = "Rune defender";
            itemDef.description = "A defensive weapon.".getBytes(); 
		break;

Pic of Rune Defender (notice its silver that’s my problem)

Note
I haven’t done anything server sided but I don’t see how that could affect the color =S

Read full topic
